text: Everyone who gets annoyed by people chewing loudly.
Everyone who hates it when people use 'your' instead of 'you're'.
Everyone who can't stand slow walkers in public.
Everyone who cringes when someone scrapes their fork on a plate.
Everyone who gets irrationally angry at buffering videos.
Everyone who dislikes people who stand too close when talking.
Everyone who is bothered by people who don't use turn signals.
Everyone who hates when someone spoils a movie or TV show.
Everyone who can't deal with people who are chronically late.
Everyone who finds it annoying when people talk during a movie.
